name: Rapid.fun
description: Rapid dot fun is the first decentralized marketplace for prompts on Solana, enabling users to buy, sell, and tokenize prompts. Rapid.fun is revolutionizing the AI prompt marketplace by creating the first decentralized platform on Solana. Our platform enables users to buy, sell, and tokenize prompts - the essential building blocks for AI-generated content. From stunning images to insightful answers, these prompts are the key to unlocking AI's potential. Tokenization on Solana Transform your prompts into unique digital assets on Solana's blockchain. Our tokenization process ensures: Verifiable ownership on the blockchain Secure trading with smart contracts Sub-cent transaction fees 50,000 transactions per second Marketplace Mechanics Buy Prompts Purchase regular or tokenized prompts using SOL with instant delivery and verification. Sell Prompts List your prompts on the marketplace and earn SOL from your expertise. Tokenize Convert your prompts into blockchain assets for enhanced value and tradability.
